enchantment.l2weaponry.ender_hand.desc: Thrown attacks will appear as direct hit.
enchantment.l2weaponry.energized_will.de: Gradually increase machete attack range when stacking consecutive attacks. Conflicts with Raised Spirit.
enchantment.l2weaponry.ghost_slash.desc: Empty hits will stack hit count and consume durability as well.
enchantment.l2weaponry.hard_shield.desc: Increase shield defense. Works for both hands.
enchantment.l2weaponry.heavy.desc: Reduce attack speed, increase critical hit and projectile damage. Works on Axe and heavy weapons.
enchantment.l2weaponry.heavy_shield.desc: Reduce movement speed, increase shield defense by a lot in main hand.
enchantment.l2weaponry.raised_spirit.des: Gradually increase machete attack speed when stacking consecutive attacks. Conflicts with Energized Will.
enchantment.l2weaponry.stealth.desc: Dagger damage has a chance to not aggravate enemy, but reduce damage.
l2weaponry.legendary.abyss_echo: Critical hit will bypass magical protections.
l2weaponry.legendary.abyss_resonance: For over %s consecutive attacks, damage will bypass magical protections.
l2weaponry.legendary.abyss_shock: Damage dealt to enemies not targeting user will bypass magical protections.
l2weaponry.legendary.abyss_terror: Damage dealt to enemies targeting user will bypass magical protections.
l2weaponry.legendary.axe_of_cursed_flame: Inflict soul flame on targets. Protect holder from fire damage.
l2weaponry.legendary.barbaric_hallow: Damage penetrates armor, damage increase target's armor value.
l2weaponry.legendary.blade_of_illusion: When target has less lost health than consecutive damage dealt, next consecutive attack to the same target will increase that difference.
l2weaponry.legendary.claw_of_determinati: When damage dealt is reduced, next consecutive attack to the same target will increase double of the amount reduced.
l2weaponry.legendary.dogmatic_punishment: On critical hit, increase damage by user's damage absorption.
l2weaponry.legendary.dogmatic_standoff: Gain damage absorption equal to %s%% of target health. Would not exceed %s%% of target health.
l2weaponry.legendary.hammer_of_incarcera: Immobilize enemies within %s blocks when performed a falling attack.
l2weaponry.legendary.haunting_demon_of_t: Aim at a target within %s blocks and right click to teleport near it.
l2weaponry.legendary.poseidon_madness: Thunder strike all enemies hit, thrown or sweep, regardless of position and weather. Protect holder from fire and thunder damage.
l2weaponry.legendary.shadow_hunter: Right click target within %s blocks to teleport to its back, and wipe its anger. Damage penetrates armor if target does not target you.
l2weaponry.legendary.shadow_shredder: Inflict levitation and slow falling for a short time to enemies.
l2weaponry.legendary.spear_of_winter_sto: Frost targets. Protect holder from powdered snow.
l2weaponry.legendary.vampire_desire: Restore health based on damage dealt. Increase damage stack limit based on enemies killed.
l2weaponry.legendary.void_escape: Not affected by gravity. When hit a block, teleport to that position. Holder gets levitation and slow falling in void.
l2weaponry.mats.tf.fiery: Deal %s%% more damage to mobs not immune to fire, and ignite it for %s seconds.
l2weaponry.mats.tf.knightmetal: Increase damage by %s%% of enemy armor.
l2weaponry.mats.tf.shield_effect: On blocking damage, grant %s to user
l2weaponry.mats.tf.shield_reflect: Shield reflect %s%% extra damage on blocking.
l2weaponry.mats.tf.steeleaf: Deal %s%% more damage to mobs without armor, with %s%% chance to cause bleeding.
l2weaponry.tool.claw: Deal damage to all surrounding mobs. Increase damage for consecutive attack. Block damage shortly after attack.
l2weaponry.tool.claw.extra: Double weld for larger sweep range, higher damage stack limit, and full angle blocking.
l2weaponry.tool.dagger: Deal high damage to enemies not targeting attacker
l2weaponry.tool.hammer: Double hand weapon. Break through armors
l2weaponry.tool.javelin: Pierce through multiple enemies when thrown
l2weaponry.tool.machete: Deal damage to all surrounding mobs. Increase damage for consecutive attack.
l2weaponry.tool.machete.extra: Double weld for larger sweep range and higher damage stack limit.
l2weaponry.tool.plate_shield: Main hand only. Resistant against attacks that would break regular shields. Reflect damage with right timing.
l2weaponry.tool.plate_shield.extra: Knockback enemies on hit, and deal 3x damage on critical hit. Damage bypass armor.
l2weaponry.tool.round_shield: Blocking would not slow down player, and allow sprinting.
l2weaponry.tool.throwing_axe: You can throw this axe toward target.
